experience.title: Member
experience.description: - We provided a sustainability roadmap for the hypothetical trade organisation NAWCI by identifying the major problems faced while switching to sustainability. - We came up with a 3Cs(Capture, Control, Collaborate) strategy to reduce carbon emissions in the three legs of supply chain: warehousing, transportation and packaging.- The highlight of our solution was the NAWCI dashboard, which brings in a standardization approach within the industries. I conceptualized and prototyped this flagship solution of a digital platform involving all the key stakeholders: NAWCI companies, startups, ESG investors and academic institutions. - We obtained final impacts for 15 out of 35 Solutions with an overall reduction in of around 11% GHG emission at the end of the final phase.
experience.description_html: - We provided a sustainability roadmap for the hypothetical trade organisation NAWCI by identifying the major problems faced while switching to sustainability. - We came up with a 3Cs(Capture, Control, Collaborate) strategy to reduce carbon emissions in the three legs of supply chain: warehousing, transportation and packaging.- The highlight of our solution was the NAWCI dashboard, which brings in a standardization approach within the industries. I conceptualized and prototyped this flagship solution of a digital platform involving all the key stakeholders: NAWCI companies, startups, ESG investors and academic institutions. - We obtained final impacts for 15 out of 35 Solutions with an overall reduction in of around 11% GHG emission at the end of the final phase.

experience.description: - Optimised the COVID-19 vaccine supply chains through a two-stage linear programming model using IBM CPLEX Optimization software- Obtained the optimized allocation of 40 sectors with an operational cost of Rs. 2.85 lakhs and a maximum distance traveled of 1.5 km
